title: Facebook-Based Teacher Education Material Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: In-corporate social studies job training program where current teachers share educational materials via Facebook.

learning_goals: Teachers can share and provide real-time feedback on educational materials with peer teachers using Facebook group features.
Customized social studies activity sheets can be designed by analyzing provided educational video case studies.
Microlearning content under 5 minutes can be created and shared in mobile environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
